(Simplified: 峥)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 爭 indicates the sound; 山 (mountain) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 山 [ shān ] mountain, hill, peak
    • 爭 [ zhēng ] to dispute, to fight, to contend, to strive
①(崢嶸)a。高峻、突出，如“山勢崢崢”；b。不平凡，不尋常，如“崢崢歲月”。
崢嶸 [ zhēng róng ]: towering; lofty and steep (mountains); extraordinary; outstanding
崢嶸歲月 [ zhēng róng suì yuè ]: memorable years; months and years of hard struggles (idiom)
崢嶸軒峻 [ zhēng róng xuān jùn ]: to be in perfect condition and undiminished splendor (idiom)
(Simplified: 峥)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 爭 indicates the sound; 山 (mountain) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 峥

Traditional in your browser 繁体字的浏览器显示:崢

Traditional in Unicode standard 繁体字的Unicode标准:U+5D22

Older traditional characters 旧繁体字/异体字: Not exist

Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:峥

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+5CE5

Main pronunciation 主要发音: zhēng

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning lofty and noble or steep.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 峥嵘 zhēng róng (lofty and steep peak)

Importance by frequency 常用频率:

Shuowen 说文解字: 嶸也從山青聲臣鉉等曰今俗別作崢非是

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 崢 from mountain 山 shān and phonetic two-hands-pull (争)爭 zhēng.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :

Simplification rule :

崢字的基本解释

崢
zhēng
同“峥”。

崢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhēng］
“峥1”的旧字形。

崢字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　崢； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页314第32
【集韻】鋤耕切。同崝。【說文】崝嶸也。本作崝。或作崢。【韓愈·城南聯句】高言軋霄崢。【註】山之切云者。【孟郊·感興詩】吾欲載車馬，太行路崢嶸。　【正字通】崝、崢古人詩賦皆互見，字雖別而意相通。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　zheng; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 314 32
[Ji Yun] hoe plowing and cutting. Tongwei. 【Said the text】Kao Rong also. This is a 崝. Or make Zheng. [Han Yu·Chengnan Lianju] Gao Yan rolled Xiaozheng. [Note] The mountain cuts the cloud. [Mengjiao·Ganxing Poem] I want to carry a horse and a carriage, and the Taihang Road is full of greatness.　【Zhengzitong】The ancient poets and verses of Wei and Zheng all see each other, although the characters are different, they have the same meaning.
